name: Simpsons Memory Game
objective: Build a carding-picking game with React.js based on the Simpson characters. Scores are stored in a MySQL DB.
technologiesUsed: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MySQL, Amazon RDS, React Hooks, React Spring API, SCSS, Bootstrap

name: A_Connect (Forkaia Application)
objective: Developed the user and authentication back-end with Node.js, MongoDB, and JWTs. Linked the back-end to React.js front-end.
technologiesUsed: Node.js, Express.js, Mongo DB, JWT, React.js, Bootstrap
